title: Not Gaining Any Influence Points(IP)
body: After playing for a few games i realise my ip has been stuck on the same amount as before,its staying on 4796 and not increasing at all,please help!{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Has this resolved itself? Are the matches listed in your match history.
Yea it seems it was just a visual bug some of my other friends had it happen to them to,might be a bug
